text: Ferdi may refer to: * Ferdi Elmas (born 1985), Turkish footballer * Ferdi Tayfur (born 1945), Turkish arabesque singer, actor and composer * Ferdi Sabit Soyer (born 1952), former de facto Prime Minister of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus * Ferdi Taygan (born 1956), former tennis player Category:Turkish masculine given names
title: Ferdi
